description:
Living style guides as a representation of UI are very popular in modern frontend development. And the next step further is a style-guide-driven development of UI components which means that your living UI book becomes your development playground. 

Varya Stepanova is a front end developer originally from the North of Russia currently based in Helsinki, Finland at SC5 Online
